A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi only answers one question reasonably well\, will people really like a movie that is mostly about a ship being chased threw space. Everything in this movie is a let down Ray yep a no body\, Snoike who cares about his story\, Luke while not killing his father and never losing hope decides he has to kill his nephew due to the possibility he would go dark\, yep that makes sense. This movie pretty much killed any enthusiasm I had for the series. Unlike Luke at least there is a reason behind it.
